name: Lake Pleasant Living

reviews.title: Great views
reviews.text: This place was recommended to us by a couple who we'd met in S Africa and we didn't really know much about it. Luckily we were very pleasantly surprised and it's a great place to stay on the Garden Route if you want somewhere away from the crowds.

reviews.title: Lake Pleasant is first rate
reviews.text: As the name suggests this place is situated on the edge of a lake on the main route from George to Knysna. The views of the lake are absolutely beautiful and the hotel is situated in pleasantly landscaped grounds. The accommodation is in the form of self catering suites which are huge. The rooms are obviously fairly newly decorated and look fresh and airy. The lounge also features an open plan kitchen which is fairly well equipped. For those who don't want to cook there is a bistro in the hotel but we found the food here to be pretty average. Breakfast is good with a choice of hot and cold options.

reviews.title: Better Location
reviews.text: A great place to stay for a relaxing & peaceful time.

reviews.title: Resort in beautiful setting
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Lake Pleasant with our 10 years old daughter and had a wonderful time. The setting is very picturesquem and we were able to enjoy the perfect lakeside view from our room - great for bird watching. Room itself was spacious and large, with a bed in the lounge area for my daughter. Everything you would expect of a hotel at thislevel was provided. The room was nicely decorated with some good original artwork on the walls. Housekeeping was immacualte. Staff were pleasant and helpful. Lake Pleasant is a great place to get away from it all and enjoy mature. Knysna is an attractive town, esepcially at the Heads.

description: "The Garden Route, a panoramic region idyllically placed between the Indian Ocean & the Outeniqua & Tsitsikamma mountains, is home to Lake Pleasant Living Exclusive Holiday Suites in the Knysna district. This charming property, built on the edge of one of the few natural freshwater lakes in the southern hemisphere, is a serene retreat set in the picturesque Goukamma Nature & Marine Reserve. Welcome to Lake Pleasant Living where the discerning traveller will find superb facilities in tranquil surrounds. Enjoy Lake Pleasant as a holiday destination to stay or a lifestyle investment to buy. More than a hotel room, our spacious suites & villas are equipped with all the modern conveniences. Experience ‘lifestyle living’ & not merely just a room to overnight."
